questions.question_text: Which condition is true about the use of the hash join algorithm?

choices.A: No index can be used for the join.
choices.C: The smallest of the tables in the join must fit in memory as set by join_buffer_size.
choices.B: The query must access no more than two tables.
choices.D: At least one of the tables in the join must have a hash index.
The app user had the highest total number of rows read from storage engines.
choices.A: The root user had the largest number of modified rows for a SELECT statement.
choices.C: The root user had the largest single wait time.
choices.B: User bob had the largest total time waiting for locks.
choices.E: User bob had a significantly higher ratio of SELECT + INSERT statements to QUIT than both app and root users.

choices.B: InnoDB buffer pool LRU management data

discussion.content: this question is the same with number 21.

Selected Answer: BDG
INNODB_BUFFER_PAGE_LRU
VIEW
ROUTINES

questions.question_text: Which three are types of information stored in the MySQL data dictionary? (Choose three.)

choices.D: Manual download of separate product packages is required before installing them through MySQL Installer.
choices.A: It installs most Oracle MySQL products.
choices.E: It provides a uniform installation wizard across multiple platforms.
choices.C: It provides only GUI-driven, interactive installations.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true about MySQL Installer? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: I think A and C. B is maybe, but it can't do all upgrades.

choices.A: MySQL Router is configured based on the information in files in directory_path.
choices.B: MySQL Router configures itself based on the information retrieved from the InnoDB cluster metadata server.
choices.D: MySQL Router configures all the cluster nodes based on the information retrieved from the InnoDB cluster metadata server.

questions.question_text:
Examine this command, which executes successfully:
$ mysqlrouter --bootstrap user@hostname:port --directory=directory_path
Which activity is performed?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The given command $ mysqlrouter --bootstrap user@hostname:port --directory=directory_path is using the MySQL Router's --bootstrap option. The purpose of the --bootstrap option is to configure MySQL Router to connect to an InnoDB cluster metadata server and retrieve configuration information from it.
